metadata.name: Elixir
metadata.description:
- Redeemable -

All Jack Storms Wearables Fine Art Jewelry pieces feature an actual piece of Jack Storms glasswork.

The Elixir is made out of the finest optical lead crystal and dichroic glass that has been meticulously cut and polished. Each Elixir features over three hundred cuts and naturally sparkles like a large diamond. The beauty and complexity of the Elixir make it one of Jack Storms's most sought-after wearable pieces.

This digital item is physically redeemable for its physical likeness, the Elixir pendant from Jack Storms!

Featuring the breathtaking graphics of Jolted.eth - every digital render, a masterpiece of engineering.
